jobDetails.title: Flutter Developer
jobDetails.description: A company in South Africa is looking to hire a full time Product Designer. The potential candidate must have a great eye for design and should be able to work in a fast-paced environment. Candidate should be proficient with Zoom and Slack. Relocation expenses will also be provided.
